    Wage, Income and Consumption Inequality in Japan, 1981-2008: from Boom to Lost Decades

    Published: October 01, 2014

    Chartbook of Economic Inequality

    Recommended citation: Lise, Jeremy, Nao Sudo, Michio Suzuki, Ken Yamada, Tomoaki Yamada (2014): "Wage, Income and Consumption Inequality in Japan, 1981-2008: from Boom to Lost Decades," Review of Economic Dynamics, Vol. 17, pp. 582-612, 2014.
